full_summary:
# Tender Notice:
### External Independent Validation of the Internal Audit Function
#### Government Contract Notice (CBC-20-2347)

**Definition:**

As part of the Practice Inspection, the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) seeks to engage the services of an independent and qualified assessment team to conduct an external validation of its internal audit function.

**Background:**

The CNSC's Internal Audit, Evaluation and Ethics Division will undergo a self-assessment of its internal audit function, culminating in a report recommending improvements to the function. To ensure the accuracy and reliability of the self-assessment, the CNSC will engage an independent qualified assessment team to validate the report's conclusions.

**Inclusion Criteria:**

Eligible bidders must have expertise in conducting independent assessments and validations of internal audit functions, as well as experience in Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat Internal Audit Policy and the Institute of Internal Auditors Standards.

**Selection Criteria:**

The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price, as per the Canadian Government Tendering Regulations.

**Notice Details:**

- **Reference Number:** cb-211-478437
- **Publication Date:** 2023-10-17
- **Closing Date:** 2023-11-15, 14:00 EST
- **Country:** Canada
- **Urdu Location:** Ottawa
- **Region of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Contracting Authority:** (Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission) 280 Slater Street, Ottawa ON, K1P 5S9
